content.rendered:
Roomi is for everyone ❤️

Roomi helps humans across the world find roommates that get them. We’re committed to making your housing search easy, safe and welcoming.

This is why we’re expanding our gender options to include “Non-Binary” to better reflect the community we serve.

Our intention is to create a platform that more accurately represents the spectrum of gender expressions, and make it easier for our users to access inclusive housing options.

More options, more belonging

You can edit or update your gender identity on Web by clicking your profile picture, go to “Settings”, and choose one of the gender options available. Available on web only.

Make your search more inclusive

For listers looking for a roommate, edit your listing and update your Roommate Preference to include Non-binary or No preference to connect with all possible roommates. Go to My listings click on the listing you’d like to update and change the Roommate Preference section.

For movers looking for a room, you can find the Preferred Gender Roommate filter under More Filters.

Come as you are

We’re committed to making our platform gender-inclusive in language and imagery, so you feel welcomed, cared for, and heard— exactly as you are.

Plus, we’re encouraging all our users to include their pronouns in their bios!

We’re here for you ?

If you’ve got thoughts or questions, we’re listening! Contact us at hello@roomiapp.com.

Thanks for being you! Your friends at Roomi

jetpack-related-posts.title: Is Gender-Neutral Housing Right For Me?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: More gender-neutral housing options are gaining popularity to cater to a more inclusive group of accommodation seekers. With these welcome changes, it has become easier to find mixed-gender housing today. If you are looking for a safe space that is inclusive of all genders, gender-inclusive housing can be great! Here…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Supporting Your Transgender Roommate
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: A roommate can become a support system, which is crucial for everyone, especially if you have a gay or transgender roommate. Want to know how to make your roommate feel comfortable? Let’s find out! Here’s What to Keep in Mind Understanding the needs and expectations of your roommates can help…

jetpack-related-posts.title: 12 Cheap Housing Options For Affordable Living in 2024
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: As the cost of living continues to rise, finding affordable housing options has become a top priority for many individuals and families. The good news is that there are plenty of creative and cost-effective solutions available for those willing to think outside the box. From tiny homes and co-living spaces…

img.alt_text: 12 Cheap Housing Options To Explore For Affordable Living

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs SpareRoom: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The move to a new city is a challenging time, especially if you have to find an apartment and a roommate to live with. Choosing a place to live or a person to share your space with is a big decision and it can be hard to get it right.…

jetpack-related-posts.title: What we’ve learned from processing over 100,000 background checks
jetpack-related-posts.author: Alex Larsen
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Everything we do here at Roomi is focused on making it safer to find a new roommate or new place to live - so it’s no surprise that we spend a lot of time thinking about the best way to implement identity verification and background check solutions. Through research and…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roomi vs RoomSync: Choosing the Best Roommate Finder
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Living in New York is expensive. Whether you're a student or a young person starting on a career path, you can quickly get swamped out with bills. Stacks of 'em. Pairing up with a roommate allows you to save money on rent and utilities, freeing up your money for other…
